item.title: Road Surface Under the Bridge Failing - Lots of Pot Holes, 15th January
item.description:
Under the bridge is now riddled with potholes across most of the west bound side of the road. Has been like this for while and it only getting worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The pot holes in Hearne Road GL53 8RE are getting dangerous but need to be patched quickly due to extra traffic., 15th January
item.description:
The pot holes are in the length of Hearne Road and getting really bad. We still have winter weather to come. They need to be patched quickly as the road is important during the A40 closure.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Hearne Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: You recently fixed a sink hole and had to stop traffic for days. It’s outside number 17., 14th January
item.description:
The sinkhole that you previously fixed in the road outside number 17 just before Christmas is sinking again and it’s dangerous and causes a hell of a bump when you drive over it. In no way can this been seen as fixed as there is a large depression where it should be level with the rest of the road. Either it wasn’t completed properly or it’s sinking again. Either way it’s a hazard and a cow pat black tarmac ‘fix’ .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50;52, All Saints' Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
